forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
